pages.text: The $(bold)Roar$() command is a useful command when violence is not an option.$(br2)After issuing the command, your Pet Rock™, will unleash a loud roar, frightening away small children.$(br2)It is advised to use this command when dealing with cows, sheep, chicken and pigs that are obviously plotting
against you, or when you need to escape from a quiet romantic moment.$(br2)After roaring, Pet Rocks™ will need a moment to catch their breath before they can take any other action.
